name: Ably Hub Source
shortDescription: Capture data from an Ably Hub source

Variables.Name: output
Variables.Description: Name of the output topic to write into

Variables.Name: AblyToken
Variables.Description: The Ably API token to use

Variables.Name: AblyChannel
Variables.Description: The Ably Channel to listen to

Variables.Name: StreamId
Variables.Description: A name for the data stream
